knimeNode.name: FastSam2Bam
knimeNode.shortDescription: Converts SAM files into BAM files in parallel.

fullDescription.intro: The FastSam2Bam node converts efficiently SAM files into the compressed BAM format by using multiple threads in parallel and by creating an index file.
fullDescription.option: Set the path to the samtools installation.
Set the path to the picard tools installation.
Set the path to the output folder where the output files should be stored.

option.name: Path to genome in fasta format

fullDescription.option: Set the path to the reference genome which was used for the alignment.
Set the number of cores to be used.
Set the number of reads per junk.
Set the path to the folder where the temp files should be stored (must be fast).
Choose whether to uses /dev/shm, which is a memory device in some unix distributions, as temp folder.
Choose whether to delete the SAM file after conversion. This is a dangerous option because if the conversion fails and is not correctly detected, the sam file will be lost!

ports.outPort:
Cell 0: Path to BAM file
Cell 1: Path to index file
